intro: This document serves as a comprehensive nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's Coastal Zones product, providing a detailed description of all level 5 land cover/land use classes. It outlines their geographical characteristics, available input datasets, and relevant methods for interpreting each class, ensuring consistency and accuracy in coastal zone mapping across EEA39 countries and beyond. The nomenclature detailed herein is designed to align with the MAES ecosystem typology and maintain compatibility with other established European land cover products.
